abstract: General Motors’s new chief executive, Daniel F. Akerson, is set to earn $1.7 million in annual cash salary, the car company disclosed in a regulatory filing on Friday.
snippet: General Motors’s new chief executive, Daniel F. Akerson, is set to earn $1.7 million in annual cash salary, the car company disclosed in a regulatory filing on Friday.
lead_paragraph: 3:54 p.m. | Updated The New York Times’s Nick Bunkley provides more details of Daniel F. Akerson’s compensation at General Motors.

headline.main: New G.M. Chief’s Salary: $1.7 Million in Cash
